programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Price
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 156)While the Enterprise hosts negotiations for control of a stable wormhole, Troi forms a personal relationship with an opposing negotiator, unaware of his true being.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Vengeance Factor
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 157)The Enterprise pursues a race of "gatherers" who continue to raid Federation outposts, unaware of the dangers lurking among them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Defector
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 158)When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of an impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Hunted
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 159)Investigating a planet applying for membership into the Federation, the crew of the Enterprise finds a group of inhabitants who used to be soldiers but now fight for their very existence.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The High Ground
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 160)While visiting a planet under civil war, Dr. Crusher is taken hostage by an opposing faction of the planet's ruling government.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Deja Q
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 161)Much to Picard's displeasure, Q reappears on the Enterprise, claiming to have been ejected from the Q Continuum, and therefore, lost his powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - A Matter of Perspective
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 162)The widow of respected scientist Dr. Nel Apgar accuses Riker of seducing her and killing her husband. Rather than turn Riker over for unfavorable trial, the Enterprise reconstructs the facts.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Yesterday's Enterprise
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 163)The Enterprise C enters the Enterprise D's time and space continuum, where they find Picard and crew in a constant state of war with the Klingons, and only Guinan knows it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Offspring
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 164)After returning from a cybernetics conference to the Enterprise, Data creates his own "child," much to the chagrin of his captain, and without regards to the ramifications with Starfleet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Sins of the Father
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 165)A Klingon commander boards the Enterprise in an officer exchange program initiated by Starfleet, much to the chagrin of the crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Allegiance
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 166)Picard is kidnapped and held with three different aliens and meanwhile replaced with a replica as impostor captain.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Captain's Holiday
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 167)After mediating a difficult peace agreement, Captain Picard is encouraged to take a much needed rest on a vacationing planet, where he's visited by a strange race from the future, in search of a dangerous weapon.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Tin Man
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 168)The Enterprise reaches out to an alien being while dancing around with the Romulans, who want to attack it in an act of vengeance.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 6)A young woman lying in a hospital bed, her head wrapped in bandages, awaits the outcome of a surgical procedure performed by the State in a last-ditch attempt to make her look 'normal'.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nick of Time
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 7)A pair of newlyweds stopping in a small town are trapped by their own superstition when playing a fortune-telling machine in a local diner.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Lateness of the Hour
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 8)The daughter of an inventor objects to their 'perfect' home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Trouble with Templeton
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 9)A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Most Unusual Camera
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 10)When three dum-dum crooks get ahold of a camera that takes pictures of the future, they set out to make a quick fortune with their new toy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Night of the Meek
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 11)After a derelict Santa Claus is fired on Christmas Eve, he finds a mysterious bag that gives out presents. With this bag, he sets out to fulfill his one wish - to see the less fortunate inherit the bounties of Christmas.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Dust
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 12)In a tragic, western town, a desperate father begs for clemency as his son is slated to die for an accident he could not have prevented.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Back There
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 13)At a prominent club in Washington, D.C., a socialite argues about whether it would be possible to change history by traveling back in time. When he leaves the club he finds himself in 1865, on the night that President Lincoln will be shot.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E15 - Mental As Anything
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 15)The males of the crew undergo some training. Crichton learns how to resist Scarran probes. While D'Argo learns some self-control.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E16 - Bringing Home The Beacon
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 16)The women of Moya travel to a dead Leviathan to buy a sensor beacon for Moya which will allow her to appear to be a different ship.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E17 - A Constellation Of Doubt
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 17)John Crichton struggles to learn the location of the mysterious Katratzi, whilst watching a television documentary about himself and the aliens.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S4 E18 - Prayer
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 18)Crichton and Scorpius travel to one of the 'unrealized realities' where Crichton believes he heard Stark say 'Katratzi.'

programme.title: Robocop 2 - Robocop 2
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 1)This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3 - Robocop 3
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 1)In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Pluto TV Sci-Fi - Pluto TV Sci-Fi
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: 60 Days In - Pick a Side
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 8)The participants struggle with race politics, jailhouse thieves, and protecting their cover stories. But for one participant the secrets become too difficult to keep.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Loose Lips Sink Ships
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 9)The Sheriff and his team face a tough decision and the consequences of one participant's actions put the remaining participants in very real danger.

programme.title: 60 Days In - You Don't Belong Here
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 10)Now that one of the participants has blown his/her cover, Sheriff Lamb and his team are forced to make a decision: end the program early, or risk the lives of the remaining participants.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Reunion Special
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 11)For the first time, all seven participants will meet with the Sheriff and his team to discuss the craziest moments from their time in the Pinal County Jail.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Aaron
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 1)On January 31, 2011, 14-year-old Aaron shot his neighbor, 14-year-old Alana, in her home in Harlem, Georgia. Aaron was sentenced to life without parole at 15.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Pick a Side
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 8)The participants struggle with race politics, jailhouse thieves, and protecting their cover stories. But for one participant the secrets become too difficult to keep.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Loose Lips Sink Ships
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 9)The Sheriff and his team face a tough decision and the consequences of one participant's actions put the remaining participants in very real danger.

programme.title: 60 Days In - You Don't Belong Here
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 10)Now that one of the participants has blown his/her cover, Sheriff Lamb and his team are forced to make a decision: end the program early, or risk the lives of the remaining participants.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Reunion Special
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 11)For the first time, all seven participants will meet with the Sheriff and his team to discuss the craziest moments from their time in the Pinal County Jail.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Aaron
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 1)On January 31, 2011, 14-year-old Aaron shot his neighbor, 14-year-old Alana, in her home in Harlem, Georgia. Aaron was sentenced to life without parole at 15.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Pick a Side
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 8)The participants struggle with race politics, jailhouse thieves, and protecting their cover stories. But for one participant the secrets become too difficult to keep.

programme.title: Nightwatch - 100%, Every Time
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 7)Randy and Justin chase down a suspected car thief, while both EMT teams respond to emergency calls involving children in distress.

programme.title: Cops UK: The Bodycam Squad - Episode 4
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 4)The bodycam squad hunts for a burglar and are given the run around, a break in at a hotel unearths a mystery, and the cops are left tongue tied over the alleged theft of a bag.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Robert Black
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 9)Robert Black was a Scottish serial killer and paedophile who was convicted of the kidnap, rape, sexual assault and murder of four girls aged between five and eleven.

programme.title: World’s Most Evil Killers - Mark Hobson
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 10)Mark Hobson killed four people in North Yorkshire, England in July 2004. Hobson committed his first two murders within six days of each other. He is currently serving a whole life sentence.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Homicide Squad ATL - Secrets & Lies
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 4)New leads emerge in the Fallen Angel case. And in the heart of Atlanta's wealthiest neighborhood, a man is brutally beaten and shot to death.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Homicide Squad ATL - Hot Sun, Cold Blood
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 5)On the one-year anniversary of Bridget Shiel's brutal murder, with no progress on finding her killer, Lowe organizes a vigil and canvass to try and generate new leads and give her family some resolution.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Body in the Canal
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 120)The story of a barbaric murder and how smart police work and a broad forensic investigation not only identified the victim, but ultimately led to the people responsible.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Grangegorman Killer
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 121)This case, involving Ireland’s only living serial killer, was brought to a close after nearly two decades, with the help of advances in forensic science.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Tracing Suzanne Nauman's Murderer
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 122)The story of the violent death of a young, woman, how her murder investigation led police to another case, and how the science of DNA profiling played a central role in unravelling the truth.

programme.title: The First 48 - Downstream Drifter / Murder in Room 162 (#18)
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 6)In San Antonio, TX, Det. Tim Angell and his partners find a nameless man beaten to death floating in a creek; they must race to identify the victim and find anyone who may have known him.

programme.title: The First 48 - Twisted Honor / Vultures (#21)
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 7)In Phoenix, Det. Dave Barnes must track down desperate lovers on the lam to solve a savage shotgun murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Silence in the Grove / Show Stopper (#22)
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 8)In Miami's Coconut Grove, Sgt. Joe Schillaci and his team try to solve a near-impossible case of four men shot while sitting in their car. The shooting left an innocent passenger dead...but the three survivors refuse to name names.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Trail of Evidence
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 1)In Harris County Texas, a 38-year-old man is stabbed to death in his own home leaving behind two children and his wife. Investigators track down the suspect thanks to surveillance video and some good old fashion detective work.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Burned Alive
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 2)A woman is badly beaten, set on fire, and left to die in a trailer on the outskirts of Houston. Investigators discover that the assault was likely a revenge attack.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 180)The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 117)Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 150)The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Hard Time
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 19)After an alien race implants false memories of a twenty-year prison sentence into O'Brien's brain, he has trouble readjusting to station life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Shattered Mirror
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 20)Sisko follows his son into a war-torn alternate universe after Jake is lured there by the living counterpart of his late mother.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Muse
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 21)While Odo provides shelter for a pregnant Lwaxana Troi, Jake Sisko falls under the spell of a mysterious woman.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - For The Cause
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 22)Sisko is shocked to learn that his girlfriend, Kasidy Yates, may be a Maquis smuggler.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Quickening
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 23)Attempting to stop a group of Jem'Hadar renegades from gaining power, Sisko and the Defiant crew must join forces with deadly Jem'Hadar soldiers.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - To The Death
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 24)Bashir tries to save a Gamma Quadrant society afflicted with an incurable, terminal disease by the Jem'Hadar.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Body Parts
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 25)Misdiagnosed with a terminal disease, Quark sells his body parts on the Ferengi market to pay off his debts, then finds himself unable to break the contract.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Broken Link
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 26)Odo is forced to return to the homeworld of his people and face judgment for killing one of his own.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Apocalypse Rising
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 1)Sisko, Odo, O'Brien, and Worf enter Klingon territory on a suicide mission to expose Gowron, the Klingon leader, as a Changeling.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Ship
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 2)A severely injured crewmember's life hangs in the balance as Sisko battles for control of a crashed Jem'Hadar warship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Looking For Par'mach In All The Wrong Places
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 3)Worf helps Quark woo a visiting Klingon woman, even though he is in love with her.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - ...Nor The Battle To The Strong
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 4)Trapped on a planet under Klingon attack, Jake Sisko panics in the heat of battle.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Trials And Tribble-Ations
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 5)Sisko travels back in time to a pivotal moment in the history of the original Starship Enterprise.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 10)A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 5, Episode 4)Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 10)Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: (Season 1, Episode 1)Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 18)New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 14)It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 23)The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 11)A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 3, Episode 3)While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 15)Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 7)A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 2, Episode 18)New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: (Season 4, Episode 10)A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.
